infos.value: There is news that the forces of our first division, «Equito», are storming into battle with Oelde's men.
So you have finally come to a decision?
As you had hoped, is it not? Are you satisfied?
Am I...satisfied? Heheh.
Why do you laugh?
Our wish was to have King Oelde of Leonis's head, was it not?
I have not forgotten.
Are you so certain?
If you wish to incur Lord Sadali's displeasure, do be aware that a kingdom like this can easily fall overnight.
I would consider your situation carefully, were I you.
Unless...you still do not understand the position your kingdom is in, perhaps?
Are you making a mockery of me!? Insolent bastard!
Oh, dear. It seems you have taken offense. Perhaps you could release your temper on the front lines instead of arrogantly barking from upon the throne?
Hmph. The true intent of your plots and schemes are clear as day.
You fear it, do you not? Oelde's ring...
Just as I thought.
Alas, if you desire the ring, then I have terms of mine own.
You have naught to fear.
Hourne will be destroyed, root and stem. That plan remains unchanged.
Yet that cannot come to pass until Oelde's life—and that ring—has been taken.
Personally, it seems to me that you're more likely to fail than anything...
Gah!
King Khury!
Why did you take aim at the Sanctum emissary!?
No one who mocks me will be forgiven. No one!
B-but...
Heh heh heh. It is not unusual for emissaries to fail to return.
Starving wolves roam these lands from dawn till dusk, after all.
Are you referring to us?
Your Highness, who are these people...?
Viktora and Luartha. One could say that they serve me well where others would fail.
Hmhmhm. Things have gotten rather interesting, haven't they?
I'd say it's just beginning.
Excellent. That is what I like to hear.
I am paying you quite generously. Do not forget that.
I should be the one to remind you of that fact.
And there's the matter of our promise. You do intend to honor your word, correct?
About Viktora being crowned queen if we win this war.
You'll really honor those words?
Yes. That promise stands.
I'll be queen... Ahh, more enchanting words I've never spoken.
So, how many children am I to bear you?
That conversation can wait.
First we devour Leonis and Hourne, shaping this nation into the greatest land in the east. Afterwards, we look west to Rundall.
Those who deserted me, those who mocked me... I shall make them all rue the day!
Sadali's plots will come crumbling down, every last one of them!
Meanwhile, Mont and his party—
